ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Player wipe on Test
ygData.msgSnippet: well i didn t have a level 50-60, but i did have a level 44 druid and 3 or 4 other characters around level 10-15.  you probly shouldn t assume that i am not in
ygData.messageBody:
well i didn't have a level 50-60, but i did have a level 44 druid and 3 or 4 other characters
around level 10-15. you probly shouldn't assume that i am not in the same situation.


At 01:05 PM 6/21/00 -0400, you wrote:
> >
>why is it a big deal that there was no notice? you didn't get a
>grieving period?
> >
>
>I think you need to cut back on the snide comments.
>
>Regardless of the purpose of the server, people played their characters
>(some while testing) for many months, developing styles, personalities and
>friends. I hardly think if you'd been in the same situation you'd be able
>to shrug it of as "just a test character."
>
>
